metadata.synopsis: At camp, while everyone is celebrating, the parents of the dead kid and Sagha have a tense confrontation about the death of the child. Parents can either kill Sagha or forgive her.
metadata.how_to_trigger: loadlevel WLD_Main_Aoe readyattackonden (allow for flag to set)oe attackondenvictory (allow for flag to set)SetGlobalOsirisFlag DEN_AttackOnDen_Event_TieflingPartyInvitationlong restgo to beach to trigger or teleport to kagha

47.speaker: Komira
47.text: I buried my daughter because of you. I'm going nowhere.
47.context: NodeContext: Cold and furious - you're here for blood

35.speaker: Kagha
35.text: I've prayed many times over that Silvanus return me to that moment.

19.speaker: Kagha
19.text: I am sorry, a hundred times over, and a hundred more yet.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sitting downNodeContext: Begging - sincere

45.speaker: Kagha
45.text: Your daughter roused the nest. Did you expect the viper not to strike?
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sitting downNodeContext: Cold and unrepentant

17.speaker: Kagha
17.text: I will bear no more accusations. Leave me.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sitting downNodeContext: Cold and unrepentant

48.speaker: Kagha
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of wine bottle at her feet. Looks down at her hands in confusion -blinking as she moans and collapses to the ground - paralyzed.  On her back - looking up. NodeContext: Confusion as you wince, looking down at your hands. You moan and collapse to the ground - paralyzed

13.speaker: Komira
13.text: I want you to feel small. I want you to feel helpless. Just like her.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: On haunches - looking Kagha in the eye. Kagha on her back - terrified.NodeContext: Crouch down on your haunches. Talking to Kagha. Deathly stare. Rage, grief and murder in your voice.

18.speaker: Komira
18.text: Her name was Arabella. Picture her. How scared she was. And know - this will hurt.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Stands up. Looking down at Kagha as she draws a blade. Kagha looking terrified. Unable to speak. NodeContext: Stand up - draw a blade. Murder and ice cold fury in your voice. You hate this woman with all your being.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: If you do this you are no better than her.

38.speaker: Komira
38.context: NodeContext: Anger as you yell at player

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Killing Kagha won't bring her back. Don't do it.

40.speaker: Locke
40.text: Mari - look at her. She's miserable. Alone. Pathetic.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gesturing to Kagha NodeContext: Pleading - sincere

12.speaker: Locke
12.text: Don't let her drag you down with her.

44.speaker: Kagha
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marriko clenches her fist and then kicks Kagha - kicking her viciously where she is lying on the ground on herb ackNodeContext: Cries out in pain as your are kicked

32.speaker: Komira
32.text: Let's go. Before I change my mind.
32.context: NodeContext: Brisk and determined - anger fading as you walk away

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Death is too good for her. Let her suffer with what she's done.

31.speaker: Komira
31.text: Hm. You make a good point.
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: To playerNodeContext: Cold murderous rage

46.speaker: Komira
46.text: Remember this moment. Remember Arabella's cold, dead body. And live with the blood of an innocent child on your hands.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: To KaghaNodeContext: Cold murderous rage

42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marricko plunges the blade into Kagha multiple times - stabbing viciously. Kagha is on the ground on her back.

1.speaker: Kagha
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Marricko plunges the blade into Kagha multiple times - stabbing viciously. Kagha is on the ground on her back.NodeContext: Cry of pain as your stabbed.

9.speaker: Komira
9.context: NodeContext: Coldly - turning to the player like an afterthought

41.speaker: Komira
41.text: It was never about feeling better. It was about justice.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking at corpseNodeContext: Not looking at player - looking down at the ground at the corpse. Sad and fatalistic.

28.speaker: Komira
28.text: Not like I was sleeping at night anyway. C'mon Locke. We're done.
28.context: NodeContext: Not looking at player - looking down at the ground at the corpse. Sad and fatalistic.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: That was a pointless waste of life.

36.speaker: Komira
36.text: Then I guess Arabella and the snake now have something in common.
36.context: NodeContext: Not looking at player - looking down at the ground at the corpse. Sad and fatalistic.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: This will only cause more pain in the end.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Slit her throat, or she'll summon help.

11.speaker: Komira
11.text: As if I'd let her draw breath.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Let her die nice and slow, in agony.

39.speaker: Kagha
39.context: NodeContext: On back - struggling to get the words out - begging. Terrified. You're about to die.
